contents.text: Thank you for calling Iterable in San Francisco, your partner in customer engagement and growth marketing.
For marketing strategy and campaign support, press 1.
To speak with a marketing strategist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with one of our marketing strategists. We’ll be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Discuss optimizing our next marketing campaign with a strategist
I need strategic advice on building a growth marketing plan for my veteran transition coaching business.
I need to discuss A/B testing strategies and CRM integration for our next email drip campaign.
I need someone to help me plan an email marketing campaign.
I’d like to speak with a marketing strategist about designing an email campaign to recruit participants for my physics research project.

contents.text: For technical support with your marketing platform, press 2.
Thank you for your patience. A marketing platform support specialist will be with you momentarily.

navigationGoals: Get help troubleshooting a technical issue in our marketing platform
I'm having trouble integrating my email lists via API into Iterable for my veteran advocacy newsletter and need technical support.
I need help debugging our API webhook so our automated campaigns trigger correctly.
I’m having trouble sending my newsletter and need technical help.
I need help troubleshooting my API integration so that my lab event sign-up form syncs properly with Iterable.

contents.text: For sales inquiries and product information, press 2.
To schedule a product demo or get a feature walkthrough, press 1.
One of our sales representatives will be with you shortly to schedule your demo. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demo and feature walkthrough
I’d like to schedule a demo of Iterable’s features to see how it can support my veteran services organization.
I’d like to schedule a hands-on demo of your segmentation and personalization features.
I’d like to schedule a demo to see how the platform works.
I want to schedule a product demo to see how Iterable’s features can help me engage my student research group.

contents.text: For pricing details and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing and pricing team. We appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: Review billing charges and clarify pricing options
I have questions about the charges on my current Iterable subscription invoice for my veteran support nonprofit.
I need a breakdown of your enterprise plan pricing and details on annual versus monthly billing.
I need to review my billing statement and understand the pricing.
Can you walk me through your pricing plans and any academic discounts for a student account?
